005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark;
007
008import com.vladsch.flexmark.parser.ListOptions;
009
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark.impl.AbstractMarkupWriter;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
013
014import org.codehaus.stax2.evt.XMLEventFactory2;
015
016import java.util.List;
017import java.util.Map;
018import java.util.Objects;
019import java.util.stream.Collectors;
020
021import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
022import javax.xml.stream.XMLEventWriter;
023import javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException;
024import javax.xml.stream.events.Attribute;
025import javax.xml.stream.events.EndElement;
026import javax.xml.stream.events.StartElement;
027
028import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
029
030public class MarkupXmlEventWriter
031    extends AbstractMarkupWriter<XMLEventWriter, XMLStreamException> {
032
033  @NonNull
034  private final XMLEventFactory2 eventFactory;
035
036  /**
037   * Construct a new event writer.
038   *
039   * @param namespace
040   *          the XML namespace to use for XMHTML content
041   * @param listOptions
042   *          list production options
043   * @param writer
044   *          the XML event stream to write to
045   * @param eventFactory
046   *          the XML event factory used to generate XML events
047   */
048  public MarkupXmlEventWriter(
049      @NonNull String namespace,
050      @NonNull ListOptions listOptions,
051      @NonNull XMLEventWriter writer,
052      @NonNull XMLEventFactory2 eventFactory) {
053    super(namespace, listOptions, writer);
054    this.eventFactory = Objects.requireNonNull(eventFactory, "eventFactory");
055  }
056
057  /**
058   * Get the XML event factory used to generate XML events.
059   *
060   * @return the XML event factory
061   */
062  @NonNull
063  protected XMLEventFactory2 getEventFactory() {
064    return eventFactory;
065  }
066
067  /**
068   * Get XML events for the provided attributes.
069   *
070   * @param attributes
071   *          the mapping of attribute name to value
072   * @return the list of attribute events
073   */
074  @NonNull
075  protected List<Attribute> handleAttributes(@NonNull Map<String, String> attributes) {
076    List<Attribute> attrs;
077    if (attributes.isEmpty()) {
078      attrs = CollectionUtil.emptyList();
079    } else {
080      attrs = ObjectUtils.notNull(attributes.entrySet().stream()
081          .map(entry -> eventFactory.createAttribute(entry.getKey(), entry.getValue()))
082          .collect(Collectors.toList()));
083    }
084    return attrs;
085  }
086
087  @Override
088  public void writeEmptyElement(QName qname, Map<String, String> attributes) throws XMLStreamException {
089    List<Attribute> attrs = handleAttributes(attributes);
090    StartElement start = eventFactory.createStartElement(qname, attrs.isEmpty() ? null : attrs.iterator(), null);
091
092    XMLEventWriter stream = getStream();
093    stream.add(start);
094
095    EndElement end = eventFactory.createEndElement(qname, null);
096    stream.add(end);
097  }
098
099  @Override
100  public void writeElementStart(QName qname, Map<String, String> attributes) throws XMLStreamException {
101    List<Attribute> attrs = handleAttributes(attributes);
102    StartElement start = eventFactory.createStartElement(qname, attrs.isEmpty() ? null : attrs.iterator(), null);
103    getStream().add(start);
104  }
105
106  @Override
107  public void writeElementEnd(QName qname) throws XMLStreamException {
108    EndElement end = eventFactory.createEndElement(qname, null);
109    getStream().add(end);
110  }
111
112  @Override
113  public void writeText(CharSequence text) throws XMLStreamException {
114    getStream().add(eventFactory.createCharacters(text.toString()));
115  }
116
117  @Override
118  protected void writeHtmlEntityInternal(String entityText) throws XMLStreamException {
119    getStream().add(eventFactory.createEntityReference(entityText, null));
120  }
121
122  @Override
123  protected void writeComment(CharSequence text) throws XMLStreamException {
124    getStream().add(eventFactory.createComment(text.toString()));
125  }
126}
